channel.title: Careers on Incubyte Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Careers on Incubyte Blog

item.title: 12 Books Developers Must Read
item.description: Books are a massive source of knowledge. Before we list all the books here, we want to discuss why we think it’s essential for programmers to read them.

item.title: How We Hire Software Craftspeople
item.description: Any organization is the sum of its people and employees are its main spokespeople. Human capital is our most valued asset.

item.title: Remote Onboarding & Immersion at Incubyte
item.description: Employee onboarding is the important process of introducing newly hired employees to the organisation. It is everything that leads up to the employee’s total immersion into the organisation’s culture.

item.title: Working at Incubyte
item.description: At Incubyte we strongly believe in finding the right talent, helping them to unleash their maximum capacity, and then getting out of their way to let them do what they do best.
